thread.title: What's the Worst Show You Have Seen Every Episode of?
thread.title_full: What's the Worst Show You Have Seen Every Episode of?

author: Katharine Trendacosta
title: What's the Worst Show You Have Seen Every Episode of?
text:
Torchwood: Miracle Day, BBC Worldwide Productions/Starz 
Completionism is a disease that forces some people to finish something even though it has gone horribly wrong. This is why I have seen all of Charmed . And why my colleague James Whitbrook shudders when you mention Torchwood: Miracle Day. So, we ask you, whatâ€™s the worst show you watched every minute of? Extra points for length of suck.
